How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key1: You will need to install Node to run JS on your laptop. Without Node we can not run our js code on our laptop.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key2: Node js is an environment to run javascript code outside a web browser. Like in our laptops.
